FullPhrase: Humans have genes from other species, which consists of as many as 145 genes from bacteria, fungi and viruses.

PhraseSymbolList: SOMEBODY TELLS YOU TO BREAK A LEG
FullPhrase: If you are an actor or musician, somebody tells you to break a leg before getting onto the stage for good luck.

Words.Description: Ideal is defined as something or someone who is thought of as a perfect example of something.

PhraseSymbolList: LILIES ARE HIGHLY TOXIC TO CATS AND DOGS, AND SHOULD BE KEPT AWAY FROM THEM
FullPhrase: Lilies are highly toxic to cats and dogs, and should be kept away from them. Even sniffing it can cause toxic shock in your pet, while eating just a tiny bit of it can result in a serious illness
